meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Peter Guekguezian Melanie Glassco Debb Johnson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7555.

td.p: Peter Guekguezian, a Ph.D. student in linguistics from Fresno, California
Melanie Glassco, a curriculum development program manager from Atlanta, Georgia
Debb Johnson, a retired teacher from Columbia, Maryland (whose 1-day cash winnings total $12,700)

tr.td: VEEP
RHYME TIME
STOCK SYMBOLS
TV WORKPLACES
(Alex: Name the type of workplace that's central to each show.)
EAST ON THE MAP
1971's COSMO GIRL'S GUIDE TO THE NEW ETIQUETTE
